mapper.update:
update t_userinfo_operate_log
UserInfoId = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OperateUserId = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OperateTime = #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AuditId = #{auditId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_userinfo_operate_log set UserInfoId = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OperateUserId = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OperateTime = #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AuditId = #{auditId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_userinfo_operate_log c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.UserInfoId like concat ('%', #{userInfoId},'%')
and c.Content like concat ('%', #{content},'%')

from t_userinfo_operate_log c
